raw_data.title: Why is async/await so confusing in JavaScript?
raw_data.content: I've been trying to understand async/await for weeks and it still doesn't make sense. The documentation is unclear and examples are inconsistent.
raw_data.author: confused_dev

raw_data.text: Anyone else finding the new deployment process really frustrating? Takes forever and fails randomly.

raw_data.title: Documentation for configuration is missing key details
raw_data.body: The config documentation doesn't explain what half the options do. Had to read the source code to figure it out.
raw_data.author: github_user

raw_data.subject: Unable to complete checkout process
raw_data.description: The checkout button doesn't work on mobile. Tried multiple times, keeps timing out.

raw_data.text: Love the product but the onboarding is really difficult. Took me hours to figure out the basics.
raw_data.author: @techuser
